inn1.comm: ooh, nice movement away from the left-hander, landed on a good length outside off and nipped away, shoulders arms to leave it be
some swing this time, moving away, landed on a length and Smith drove it to mid-off

appeal for caught-behind, short of a good length and nipping away, not as much as the first two balls but just a hint, Smith wtihdrew as he got on to the back foot, the bat hit his pad and hence the sound
beaten again, landed on a good length and shot away as he moved on to the back foot to defend it back, sharp movement and whizzed past the outside edge
and yes, that's what we were expecting weren't we, nipped back in, short of a good length and came back in, got an inside edge onto the pads on the way to Dhoni
pitched up and gets the treatment, was uppish but safe, landed on a length and he chased it, driving it over extra cover for a boundary
short of a length outside off, moving away, leaves it alone to the keeper, a widish slip in place
in the slot and given the form he's in, Amla's not going to forgive those, pitched up and he caresses it through the covers
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side
crunched it off the front foot, goodish length outside off, straight to extra cover, it's a packed off-side field
poor ball, a delicious full delivery on the pads and it's flicked towards fine leg for a couple of runs
good length in the channel outside off and getting some movement, not as much as Zaheer though, left alone
went on straight this time, angling in towards middle, worked away towards midwicket

appeal for lbw, almost had him with the one that came back in, landed on a good length outside off and nipped in to catch him on the back pad, deflected off the front pad actually, not given, did it do too much? We need to see. It was high, as the replays show
back of a length on middle and off, is behind it nicely this time and drops it into the off side
back of a length outside off and moving away sharply, beaten again as he defends inside the line, the duel continues
and again, Zaheer's winning it here, goodish length, Smith is in two minds how to play it, just a step forward and presents the full face, only to be beaten as it shoots away
edged and to third man, full and wide and he goes after it, tries to crack it through the covers, the movement produces the nick
back of a length on the off, gets back and knocks it down into the off side
slightly short on middle, gets back and whips it through square leg for a couple of runs
angling away from the left-hander, cutting away and Smith shoulders arms to it
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket
he's bowling to his strength here, too straight and Smith has no trouble flicking it past a diving midwicket to the boundary, in the channel outside off is the way to go
shortish on middle and off, whipped away again, through square leg this time, for a couple more
Zaheer errs by bowling a little too full this time, is cracked through the covers for a couple of runs
short of a good length on the off, dabbed in front of cover
nice delicate hands, shortish on the off, slower delivery, Amla waits on it and dabs it past slip for a single
went on straight this time, didn't straighten, Smith defended inside the line and failed to connect
short of a good length on middle and off, gets front and across and stabs it into the off side
edged and rolls down to third man, didn't go hard at it, just a push, took the outside edge
ooh, there is a short square leg in place for that whip from Smith and he plays exactly that shot but lands short of Yusuf Pathan there, misfields and allows a single
length ball on the off, held its line, Amla sliced it towards point
short of a good length on middle, defended towards cover
accurate this time, on middle and off, holding its line again, driven back to the bowler
full and wide, Amla chases it, was aiming at extra cover but ended up slicing it to third man on the bounce
shortish on the off, rocks back and punches it to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, coming back in a hint and goes through the gate to the keeper, Amla was playing for the away movement there
pitches it up this time and it's crunched to the covers
overpitched and is struck hard but extra cover does an excellent job getting a hand to it, just a couple in the end
hurls it short and Amla is quick to spot it, gets across a hint and blazes it through midwicket for a boundary
Bowlied'im! Angling in and moves in further after pitching, lands on a good length and Amla looks to smash it through the covers, gets an inside edge and out goes the off stump
short of a good length on the off, gets an inside edge onto the pads and drops into the off side
ooh, kept really low, short of a good length and zipped through to the keeper, Smith couldn't get his bat down in time
good stuff, landing on a good length, nipping back in, gets an inside edge onto the pads as he tries to drive it to midwicket
short ball on the pads, clipped it down towards fine leg for a single
appeal for caught-behind, just a hint of away movement, potentially lethal, drew Smith forward, beat the outside edge just as Smith's bat clipped the pad
goodlish length on the off, defended towards extra cover
streaky way to get off the mark, short of a good length outside off, pushes at it with no movement off the feat, gets a thick outside edge to the third-man boundary
offcutter to the left-hander, turns the face and works it into the leg side
fullish and he gets a leading edge, Smith walked across to drive it through midwicket, got a leading edge towards cover, ran through for a single
in the corridor outside off, moving away a touch, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length on the off, gets across and drops it into the leg side
short of a good length, taps it back onto the pitch
back of a length on middle and off, Smith moved well across to turn it fine, clipped the thighs on the way to the keeper, actually went over the stumps
back of a length on middle, gets back and tries to whip it square, struck on the thighs again
shortish on the off, gets across and drops it down in front of the bowler
goodish length on the off, gets forward and pushes it to cover
missed opportunity, fullish on the pads and Ingram was looking to flick it through the leg side, missed
succeeds this time, pitched up on the pads again, wrong line from Nehra, clips it through square leg for three runs
offcutter to the left-hander, short outside off, cut down to third man for a single
targeting middle and leg stump, Ingram is on the back foot, pushes it into the off side
beaten, lovely delivery, drew him forward with a good length delivery, got it to nip away and beat the outside edge as Ingram went for the drive
floating it on the pads from round the wicket, driven towards deep midwicket for a single
pushed it straight, Ingram was playing for the turn, went for a drive on the up, got an inside edge onto this pads
appeal for lbw, angling in from round the wicket, tried to sweep it square, was struck on the pads, it went straight on, but the impact was outside the line, marginal call that
flighted outside off, pushed through towards long-off
shortish on middle and off from round the wicket, came down the track to turn it square, was struck on the pads, a stifled appeal for lbw turned down
slides it down the leg side and Taufel frees his arms
slightly short on middle, worked away off the back foot wide of square leg for a single
on middle and leg and Smith drives it hard to midwicket but there is protection there
short of a length outside off, goes for the cut, it moves away further to beat the bat
fullish on the pads, driven towards deep midwicket for a single

good bounce there, short of a good length this time, movement still for the seamers, Ingram fishes for that and misses, a nod from Smith at the other end, perhaps indicating that there is much in there in still for the bowlers
drops it short on the off and is met with a pull but straight to midwicket
edged, squared him up slightly with that short of a good length delivery, gets a thick edge down to third man

outstanding catch by Kohli at slip, turning from a good length outside off, bowling round the wicket is Harbhajan, Ingram steps forward to defend, does so inside the line, gets an edge and Kohli dives forward to his right and clasps it with one hand inches from the ground, India strike again
stretches forward to drop it on the side of the pitch, big stride forward
tossed up outside off, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
pushed it fuller on middle, flicked away for one more
quicker through the air, comes down the track and drops it into the off side
attempting to york him there, digs it out but by way of a leading edge into the off side, quick single taken
short of a good length outside off, dabs it down to third man for a single
goodish length on middle, gets forward and plays it back cautiously to the bowler
down the leg side, short ball, called a wide
short outside off and it's pulled away towards deep square leg for one
back of a length on middle, turns it behind square for a single
short but there is protection in the deep, dragged away to deep square leg again
round the wicket again, floating it on leg stump, Smith comes forward, tries to close the face, gets an inside edge onto his pads
played away into the off side
varying his pace well, quicker through the air, gets forward and tries to defend with bat close to pad, a slight inside edge there
steps out of his crease to flick it through midwicket, struck on the pads and rolls into the off side
slowed it up this time, and held it back, turned away and Smith spotted it late, tried to dab it, missed
flighted on the off, gets forward and pushes it into the leg side, good tight stuff from Harbhajan
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and drops it in front of square leg for a single
slightly short on the off, gets back and plays it in front of cover
the field is in on the off side and Smith pierces it with a firm push through the covers, just eased it after making use of some width from Nehra

missed chance for a catch, Nehra completely lost that, short and Smith got a leading edge as he tried to whip it square, went straight back towards Nehra and he simply didn't spot that, reacted really late and was surprised it came his way, a missed chance in the end
good length delivery outside off, angling away, chopped in front of point
on the pads, tucked towards square leg by Smith
length ball on off, clipped behind square by AB
fullish and on off, whipped towards wide mid-on by Smith
continue to pick off the singles, nudged past a diving midwicket
full and outside off, eased down to long-off for another single
Harbhajan drops it short, AB stands tall to punch it to mid-on to complete an over of singles

another single, unlike the easy ones of the previous over, Smith was nearly run-out, AB pushed the ball towards point, sets off for the run, Kohli is onto the ball and underarms it towards the striker's end, misses and a diving Smith is relieved to see that
clips the ball from outside off towards square leg
the singles continue, dabbed towards backward point this time
down to third man by Smith, just opening the face to guide the ball
no power in the run-scoring strokes in the last couple of overs, this time AB muscles it towards deep midwicket, where a misfield from Yuvraj gives away an extra run
short of length ball, clipped to square leg by AB
loopy delivery, AB was beaten in the flight as he charged down the track, off the front pad and pops up, muted appeal for a catch
flatter quicker delivery, slashed towards point by AB
Smith comes down the track and punches the ball back towards the bowler
gets well forward and defends
just a bit of width, Smith gets onto the back foot and guides that towards sweeper cover
another easy single, fullish ball is worked toward square leg by AB
starts with a ball sliding down leg, whipped down to fine leg, superb running from AB, who races back for the second, pushing his captain for the extra run
blocked back towards the bowler by AB

Zaheer Khan takes a blinder, Yusuf gets a wicket in his first over, and it was not even a very good delivery, it was short and sat up, AB looked to swat it powerfully, gets a top-edge and immediately there a loud cry of 'Catch it' from behind the stumps, Zaheer at wide long-on is running at full tilt and completes a low, tumbling catch, he latches onto it with both hands though he was sprinting, and he manages to keep it in his hand though he lands awkwardly after catching the ball
Smith defends solidly back towards the bowler
flighted delivery from Yusuf, defended again by Smith
short, tapped towards cover for a single to keep the strike
gets well forward but is rapped on the pads outside off as he looks to drive a fullish ball
tucked to square leg for a single
short and wide, Duminy slashes it towards cover
angling into middle and leg, defended by Duminy
length ball outside off, textbook forward defence from Duminy
goes for an airy drive to a ball outside off, edged towards backward point
Smith gets onto the back foot to punch a ball on middle to long-on, walks through a single
length ball on middle and off, pushed to the left of the bowler for another single
blocked off the front foot to cover
short of length ball and just outside off, driven towards long-off

Duminy looks to steer that behind the stumps, opens the face and is beaten by that one, Dhoni collects and breaks the stumps, muted appeal for a stumping, replay shows Duminy had dragged his back foot back into the crease in time
a full delivery, whipped towards deep square leg for a couple, Duminy wanted two all along, sprinting the first to have enough time for the second

Smith continues to survive, there's an lbw appeal as a straighter one from Harbhajan is misread by Smith, he looks to defend off the front foot but seems to have got a thin inside-edge onto the pad, he was a goner otherwise

and Smith's struggle is finally over, after many, many unconvincing shots he departs attempting a sweep which flies off the back of the bat to first slip, India are in control here, he was looking to paddle that one fine, stretching well forward, but he was through early with the stroke and an easy catch results
clips a length ball from outside off towards square leg
debutant du Plessis is surrounded by fielders, four of them round the bat, struck on the pad well outside off
spins into du Plessis, who defends to the leg side
quicker on middle and leg, tucked behind square leg for his first international run
blocked back towards the bowler

and another wicket, or is it? Duminy gets the benefit of the doubt, he's very lucky to survive a run-out chance, du Plessis played the ball with soft hands towards point, he was going nowhere after that shot but duminy was racing for a single, sent back and he looked a goner, the throw was good as well, Yusuf collects on top of the stumps and whips off the bails, Duminy looked to be well short when the ball made contact with the stumps, but many camera angles don't show exactly when the bails comes off, and after much deliberation that is ruled not out, Duminy had instinctively thought he was out, but he gets a life
punched to long-on for a single
flighted delivery, defended to the leg side
shorter and flatter, slapped towards point
driven down to long-on for an easy single
punched off the back foot towards point
clipped towards midwicket off the back foot for an easy single
defended off the front foot to short leg
du Plessis comes down the track and drives firmly to mid-on, too hard to get the single
straighter one from Harbhajan, du Plessis was looking for the turn and plays inside the line of a delivery well outside off
quicker delivery, fired in by Harbhajan, defended back to the bowler
Yuvraj starts with a loopy ball on legstump, pushed towards mid-on
length ball outside off, dabbed towards point by du Plessis
backs away and carves that past point
flighted and full, well outside off, du Plessis again shows he happy using his feet to the spinners, comes down the track and srives along the ground to long-off
tapped to cover point for another single
short of length ball just outside off, du Plessis moves across the stumps and pushes the ball towards the bowler
length ball heading for off, defended off the front foot
shorter this time, Duminy is down the track but can't get to the pitch, he blocks
looks to paddle that one, delicately played down to fine leg
tucked towards midwicket by Duminy
length ball is punched to long-on by du Plessis
comes down the track and looks to play it to the leg side, tucked to short midwicket where the fielder makes a sliding stop
some turn on offer for Yuvraj, played towards short third for a single
flighted delivery, punched down the ground by Duminy
a bit of width, swish and a miss from du Plessis, he wanted to carve that past point
this time he connects, crisply punched towards cover off the back foot
Yuvraj keeping things quiet, on middle and leg, slower delivery, defended off the back foot
gets a single to square leg to finish the over
slightly short, just outside off, du Plessis makes room and pushes the ball towards point
Duminy also looks to make room, he nudges the ball towards short thord
fullish on middle and leg, Duminy down the track as he punches it past the bowler
overpitched outside off, clipped towards square leg
length ball outside off, again batsman is down the pitch, whips it towards wide mid-on
shortish ball keeps a touch low, du Plessis bends and works the ball towards midwicket
guides the ball to short third
powerfully hit towards cover after coming down the track
lashes that one towards deep point for a single
length ball is driven down to long-off for another easy single
length ball outside off, batsman shuffles across and tucks the ball towards square leg
places this one between midwicket and long-on, time enough to take two before the fielders send the ball back
length ball angling into off, tucked behind square leg by du Plessis
short of length ball, on middle and off, clipped towards midwicket
shortish ball outside off, pulled with authority by Duminy to deep midwicket
short of length ball outside off, punched towards point
back of length on legstump, nudged behind square leg
way down the leg side, a free run for South Africa

huge appeal for lbw from Zaheer, just back of a length and coming into the batsman, Duminy came down the track and looked to defend, hit on the pads outside off, a delayed appeal from Zaheer, umpire says not out
short and outside off, slapped to deep point
punched to deep extra cover
closer to the stumps this time, pushed to long-on
Duminy dances down the track and pushes the ball towards mid-on
opens the face to guide the ball towards short third
short and wide, du Plessis makes room and carves that towards deep extra cover, South Africa just can't seem to find the boundary
played towards short third for a single
back of length ball angling across the batsman, who cracks it hard towards point but can't place it past the fielder
length ball on middle and off, defended towards the off side, 'wait, wait, wait' is the call from du Plessis
full ball on the pads, whipped towards midwicket by du Plessis, nicely done
short and wide, Duminy looks to punch that one towards point, gets a bottom-edge and the ball races past Dhoni to third man
shortish and on the pads, bottom hand comes off as a cramped du Plessis helps the ball down to fine leg
length ball outside off, off the back pad towards the keeper
confidently driven off the front foot towards wide long-off
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
on the leg stump, worked behind square leg
length ball, flat and just outside off, Duminy backs away and guides the ball behind point, and that brings up the 50 partnership
on middle and leg, blocked towards the off side
back of length on middle and leg, tucked towards fine leg
pushed towards midwicket, du Plessis and Duminy both start for a single then decide to turn back, du Plessis trips as he turns but there's still enough time to get back
drop the outside off ball towards point
and that's the first boundary since the 17th over, Duminy shuffles across and plays a legstump delivery fine down the leg side, smartly done
shortish ball and outside off, drops the ball at his feet, sees du Plessis wants the single and sets off to get a well-judged run
full ball angling across, du Plessis looked to whip that to midwicket, gets an edge down to third man
loopy delivery outside off, dabbed towards cover for a single that brings up the 150
length ball outside off, again it is pushed towards cover for a single, these two have batted very sensibly so far
on offstump, Duminy makes room and punches the ball to cover once more
slightly short, played off the back foot towards mid-on
length ball on legstump, du Plessis comes down the track and guides the ball towards fine leg
length ball on off, down the track and defended towards the bowler
starts with a length ball outside off that is knocked back to the bowler
short of length ball outside off, slower ball, Duminy mistimes an attempted drive towards cover, gets the ball towards midwicket
length ball slanting into legstump, tucked in front of square leg
keeps pegging at a short of length, outside off, defended towards the off side
a touch shorter this time, Duminy advances down the track and works the ball towards cover
length ball outside off, du Plessis shuffles across and clips the ball towards midwicket for a tight single
length ball outside off, jabbed towards point
Yuvraj drags it short, Duminy stays on the back foot and swipes that down to long-on
du Plessis gets his first boundary, makes a touch of room and he carcks that powerfully off the back foot past point
defended off the front foot towards cover
flighted by Yuvraj, overpitched on off, punched along the ground to long-off
length ball on middle, Duminy works it behind square
short of length ball outside off, played with soft hands towards the off side, a sharp single is pinched
length ball on offstump, du Plessis walks across the stumps and pushes the ball to the leg isde
length ball outside off, sensibly driven towards extra cover
length ball outside off, worked towards midwicket
short of length outside off, guided off the back foot to short third
back of length ball on off, tucked behind square by du Plessis, who has played with plenty of confidence today, no debut nerves for him
shortish on the pads, tickled away behind square for a single
bowls it on a length outside off, guided towards short third
pushed through cover for a single
bowled it short on middle, gets across to tickle it to short fine for a single
shortish on middle, gets across a hint to turn it past midwicket for a single
floats it outside off, turning in, gets back and punches it to midwicket
flighted on middle, Duminy comes down the track and drives it wide of long-on, just the single
fifty for du Plessis, the selectors will be watching this, tickled behind square for a single, fifty on debut, well done
Duminy uses his feet again, pushed through to deep midwicket for a single
quicker through the air, turned in sharply, drops it into the leg side
works away into the leg side off the back foot, one more
quicker one, no room there, fired it straight on middle, Duminy defends it off the back foot
slightly short on middle, whipped through square leg for a single
flighted on middle, pushed down the ground to long-on for a single
short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg for one more
some turn there, Duminy played at that a little too early, struck on the back pad, the thigh actually
streaky but helps, flighted outside off, Duminy tries to drive that through cover, gets an thick edge as it turns away to beat short third man to the boundary
slightly short on the off, rocks back and punches it to deep cover
didn't middle that, short outside off and he went for the pull, a bit of a top edge that but  lands safely in front of deep square leg
short on middle, rocks back and pulls it away to deep midwicket for a single, raises the 100 stand, nice recovery from the hosts
shortish outside off, waited for it to come on, dabbed it down to third man
good length on middle, comes down the track and punches it to extra cover
short on the off, chops it just wide of the keeper for a quick single

there, a half-century, short and it's tucked behind square, it's been a good series for Duminy so far, even in the previous game he was going along well but for a rush of blood that cost him his wicket, now for the surge
short of a good length, dropped into the off side for a single
fullish on middle, steps out and drives it in front of midwicket for a quick single
good length, Faf wants to send that back to Johannesburg, comes down the track and has a wild swing, misses
slower ball and don't quite think he picked it, but it was a safe shot in the end, came down the track and chipped it over mid-off for a boundary

gone! Another catch for Virat, another slower ball from Munaf, Faf made room and tried to clear that fielder at cover and slipped in the process, connected pretty well but didn't get the desired elevation, Virat timed his jump perfectly and took a sharp catch, the end of an innings that could potentially clinch a World Cup spot for Faf, we'll wait
short on middle, drops it into the leg side, quick single taken
shortish on the off, drops it towards point for a single

Duminy walked way too across there, was a fullish delivery but he appeared to have made his mind up there, walked well across to flick it fine, missed as Zaheer bowled it full and straight and the stumps take a beating!
Parnell, remember he was the last man out at the Wanderers? A short delivery on middle and he pulls it away over midwicket for a boundary, nice start

run-out, short and wide delivery and Parnell runs it down to third man, senses a chance to come back for the second, proves an ill-judged run, it's an excellent throw from the deep, Dhoni collects cleanly and takes off the bails to find Parnell a few inches short, three quick wickets this Powerplay, South Africa are slipping
full on middle, defended with a full face back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, taps it towards point
shortish on leg stump, worked away to fine leg for a single
back of a length on the off, not giving too much room, defended towards point
low full toss on the off, driven hard towards extra cover where its fumbled, Yuvraj has hurt his hand as he was trying to field that, got a bad bounce, struck him on the wrist, hmmm, seems okay now
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on for just a single this time
short of a good length on middle, turned into the leg side behind square, Dhoni runs and collects, just the single
short of a good length on the off, knocked behind point for a single
short, tries to open the face to run it to third man, beaten by pace there, couldn't connect
slower offcutter, manages to connect this time, runs it to third man for a single
fires it on the pads and Botha will feel he missed out, tried to clip it square, didn't get his bat to it
goodish length on the off, defended in front of point and runs across for a quick single
has a big swing, was trying to dispatch it over midwicket, got an inside edge to fine leg for a single
another wicket, Steyn connected well but found the solitary fielder there at deep midwicket, length ball and he had made his mind up, went big but not far enough, comfortable catch to Raina
short delivery on the off stump, cut down to point, a dot ball
slower one bowled short on middle, dragged through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
slower one bowled short on the off, punched back to the bowler
ooh, kept really low, slower one and zipped through, no way Botha could have made contact, was forunate that wasn't bowled straight
aiming for the blockhole, digs it out towards extra cover for a single

Done in by the low bounce, Botha is bowled! Short and quick from round the wicket, Botha had shaped up for the pull, was trying to blast it through midwicket, it didn't rise up as much as he wanted to, the rest is history
down the leg side, round the wicket again, called a wide, an appeal from Dhoni rubbished by the umpire who signalled a wide

run-out, South Africa have lost six wickets for 25, since the Powerplay, dropped into the off side, Tsotso set off for a single, was sent back but it was too late, it was a direct hit from extra cover by way of an under-arm flick by Yusuf to close the innings

inn2.comm: first delivery is on a length on the pads, whipped to deep backward square leg for a single
just shapes away a touch after pitching short of a length around off, Rohit looks to defend but is beaten, lovely delivery from Steyn
slowness on the pitch demonstrated as a length delivery from Steyn bounces twice before reaching the keeper
blocks this full one from Steyn towards the bowler
surprises Rohit with a bouncer early on, good line around off, Rohit sways out of the way
short of length with the trademark Steyn away movement, gets the outside edge, but the ball bounces a few times before reaching second slip
he starts with a good delivery, jags in after pitching around off, gets a big inside-edge onto the pads
this isn't so good from Tsotsobe, miles outside off

plenty on width on offer for Vijay, crunched off the front foot by Vijay, in the air but lands short of a diving du Plessis at cover, fielder doesn't gets his hands on the ball but is struck on the shoulder
punched crisply off the front foot towards mid-off
angling across the stumps, well outside off
has him fishing at that one, a short of length ball angling across, Vijay looks to drive through cover off the front foot, drawn towards that delivery and is beaten
gets this one to seam into the batsman, length ball pitching just outside off, Vijay gets an inside-edge towards square leg, that ends a good over from Tsotsobe
Vijay defends towards the off side, his first ball against Steyn

Dale Steyn pulls off a stunning caught-and -bowled, this is a slow track in Cape Town, this ball from Steyn stops a bit on Vijay who has to check his drive, the ball pops to the right of Steyn, who has to change direction from his follow-through and dive to latch on to that one, it was at a catch-able height though, and Vijay's one-day struggles continues, great athleticism from Steyn

Steyn is convinced he has wicket No. 2, it was a short of length ball heading for off, an almighty appeal from Steyn after Kohli is struck on the back thigh as he looks to tuck the ball towards midwicket, height saves Kohli
defends this one towards the leg side
tests him with the bouncer, doesn't get up as high as Kohli thinks it will but the batsman manages to duck under
excitement on the field as Kohli plays the ball uppishly towards square leg, lands short of the fielder though, ends a superb over from Steyn
length ball angling across, left alone by Rohit
Rohit wasn't expecting that delivery to come into him, he was playing for the away movement, cramped up by that delivery, bottom-edge towards short fine leg when he was looking to cut
good-looking drive from Kohli, overpitched outside off from Tsotsobe, timing wasn't perfect from Kohli, so though he has the placement spot-on he can't get it to the extra cover boundary
short of length delivery heading for off, Kohli stands tall and defends back to the bowler
no footwork from Kohli as he pushes an outside-off ball to point
full and very wide outside off, too far outside off for the umpire's liking
length ball much closer to off this time, blocked off the front foot
length ball on off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off
lovely stroke from Rohit, wonderful timing, overpitched and on legstump from Steyn, just flicked by Rohit to the midwicket boundary
great reply from Steyn, length ball in the channel outside off, Rohit looks to drive through the line and is beaten
slightly shorter and on middle, tucked towards square leg by Rohit
shortish ball outside off, Rohit looks to pull that one but mistimes it badly, the ball rolls back towards the bowler
Rohit tries an ambitious flick through midwicket, it was swinging away from him and gets an outside edge towards third man
overpitched on legstump, whipped behind square by Kohli
short of length ball, Rohit again goes for a booming drive, timing is totally off, the ball rolls towards mid-off, this pitch isn't conducive for flashy strokes
this was poor from Rohit, a short of length ball that was angling away from Rohit, it was well outside off but he still wanted to slog that over midwicket, doesn't connect
looks to defend off the back foot, inside-edges onto his pad
better from Rohit, Tsotsobe opens the face to steer the ball towards point
and Rohit reverts to living on the edge, back of length ball on middle and leg, inside-edged onto the body by Rohit
short of length ball on offstump, tucked towards midwicket, that one kept low, hit the bat near the toe end
this time it bounces more than Kohli expects, a length ball jagging away from outside off, beats Kohli's attempted drive
a lot more solid from Kohli, length ball blocked towards the off side
well outside off and shaping further away, Kohli shoulders arms
Steyn keeps it tight on offstump, solidly defended by Kohli off the front foot
what a shot from Kohli to end the over, length ball around off, crunched past mid-off for four, Sriram Veera who is writing the bulletin for this match says its the shot of the day
played off the back foot towards backward point, Rohit takes a couple of strides forward and checks whether Kohli wants a run, sees he does and they sprint through
blocked by Kohli towards the bowler
short of length ball on off, tucked towards midwicket
length ball outside leg, whipped in front of square leg for a single
climbs into a short of length ball from Tsotsobe, it was wide outside off, Kohli pummels it past cover for four off the front foot
length ball on off, solidly blocked towards the off side by Kohli, he's looking good
short of length ball outside off, defended towards cover
Rohit Sharma continues to live a charmed life, he was looking to play this one towards the leg side, ends up slicing it over mid-off, just about clears the fielder
again the initial intention was to play towards leg, adjust late to defend to off
Rohit's playing like Smith earlier in the day, Rohit was looking to drive straight this time, the away movement induces an outside edge towards third man
Kohli gets forward and pushes the ball towards cover
short of length on middle, clipped behind square for a single
starts with a loosener on the pads, too full, Kohli punches it past mid-on, supreme timing on that
on middle and leg, tucked behind square for a sensible single
Rohit is somehow managing to survive in the middle, he keeps going for these extravagant strokes though he's clearly not in the best of touch, this time he's beaten by the angle
outside off and left alone, better from Rohit
length ball on off, Rohit gets well forward and defends to the off side
short of length ball on the pads, muted appeal for lbw after it strikes Rohit on the front pad above the knee-roll, that would have missed leg, balls rolls toward gully
good carry through to the keeper, lands on a good length and moves away, he shoulders arms
pushed in the direction of mid-on for a quick single
beaten, played inside the line, angled in and he closed the face to that one, it held its line, beat the edge and went over the stumps, good bounce there
slightly short outside off, rocks back and defends it to point
short of a good length on the off, gets back and punches it to extra cover
pushed off the back foot towards cover
nicely done, full on the pads and it's a freebie for Sharma, driven elegantly through midwicket for a boundary
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to cover
wide, too wide, angling away and moving further, Rohit doesn't bother chasing that
lands on a good length on the off, gets across and turns the face to play it to square leg
fullish on the off, in the slot for Kohli who drives it to extra cover
pitched up and he tries to cream that through the off side, gets a thick outside edge to third man, just the single
nipping in, shortish on middle, gets back and drops it on the side of the pitch
bowls it short on the off, gets behind it nicely and defends it into the off side
slightly short on the off, tries to cream it through cover, doesn't quite get the timing right
lands on a goodish length on middle, Kohli's content just tapping it back down the pitch
short and wide and he chases it, nice carry again, misses out, can't connect
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
beaten, short of a good length and shooting away, fishes for it and then pretends to withdraw, too late as it's past him
lands on a length and is nicely struck, sweetly to cover though, straight to the fielder
angling towards middle and off, bends forward, turns the face and drops it in front of midwicket
nicely struck, bounced as much as he wanted to, short of a length and he cut it behind point to beat third man to the ropes, got on top of it there
shortish on middle, tries to work it square, is struck on the thighs, a single pinched
Rohit's lucky that did not carry, surprised him with the bouncer did Parnell, went for the hook, got a top edge and it landed in front of Steyn at fine leg
straying in line and Kohli doesn't let it go unpunished, on the pads and he helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, India well on track here
back of a length outside off, leaves it be
held it back again, short outside off, holds its line, Rohit lets it go
short outside off and he fishes for it this time, moves away and he's caught pushing at it, beats the outside edge
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot to punch it past extra cover for a single
goes after it but the movement is not allowing him to make contact, good length and there's good bounce too, beats the swing of the bat and AB takes it in front of his waist

Morkel's persistence pays off, short of a good length but much closer to off stump this time with the right amount of nip, Kohli plays at that one and feathers it to the keeper, good consistent line from Morkel has reaped its reward
lands on a good length, draws Rohit forward, tries to drive through cover, gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket instead
short of a good length on the off, nips back in, defended back to the bowler
slightly short outside off, shoulders arms to leave it through
lovely shot, a touch risky but he went after it nevertheless, it is nipping around but Yuvraj got a big stride forward and caressed it through extra cover
hmm, appeared to be a little late in reacting to that one, short outside off, initially thought of leaving it but then attempted a pull, didn't connect
short of a good length on the off, pushed towards cover
short of a good length outside off, moving away and he leaves it alone
came back in this time, sticking to length again but this one cut back in, Rohit dropped his hands on it

bowled'im! Came back in again and appeared to keep low, landed short of a good length and was heading towards middle and off, Rohit was late in getting down to it, got a bit of an inside edge onto the stumps, game on
short of a good length, cutting in, stabs it in front of point
moving away now, a touch fuller, in the channel outside off and getting it to nip away, Dhoni lets it go
lovely, trying to tempt him to come forward and drive there, lands on a length and then moves away, Dhoni doesn't bother going after it
flighted outside off and a bit of turn away, Yuvraj doesn't chase it, bordering on a wide but not called
around off stump from round the wicket, gets forward and taps it into the off side
on the stumps this time, on middle and off, gets across slightly and defends into the leg side
pushing it on a length on the off, taps it in front of cover, no single there
slows up, flighted on middle, gets forward and defends it into the leg side
quicker ball bowled flat on the off stump, struck on the pads as he came forward to defend but outside the line, appeal for lbw turned down
knocked away into the off side in front of cover
angling in towards off, pushed in front of midwicket to complete a quick single
came round the wicket to Yuvraj, on the body, flicked towards deep square leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, appeared to hold its line there, left alone
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot to push it to mid-on
shortish, rises up well, gets on the back foot to cut it to point
went after that, Botha gave some width and Yuvraj drove it uppishly towards deep cover, got the fielder on the bounce
lucky, there's no slip, shortish, turning in, went on the back foot to play it in the direction of point, got a thick edge to beat short third man for a boundary
floating it on a good length on the off, defended into the leg side
slightly short, gets on the back foot to push it to cover

India are slipping here, short outside off, turned in, Dhoni sensed a chance, rocked back to cut it past point, got an edge and AB fumbled it on the first attempt only to recover and clasp it in the second, South Africa hold the edge now. How will Yusuf and Raina respond?
gets a stride out to defend it into the off side
short on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it into the off side
nicely done, full and wide, Yuvraj got to the pitch and opened the face to square-drive it through point for a boundary, welcome runs these
back of a length now, outside off and he shoulders arms
on middle this time, turns the face to flick it through square leg for a single
good length just around off stump, gets forward and taps it towards cover
attacking the body, Raina moves forward to play it in front of Amla prowling there on the leg side
dabbed it into the off side to sneak a quick single
flicked away through square leg this time
fullish on middle, driven past midwicket for a single, was pressing for a second there but it wasn't there
shortish outside off, rocks back to slap it hard through point for a couple now
shortish on middle and off, rocks back to punch it to midwicket
fires it short on the off, punched past extra cover for a single to keep strike
to get punished! Short and wide, not unlike the delivery he received to get out in the Wanderers game, smacked through point by Raina for four
pressure-relieving stuff this, short and wide again but not as much as the previous ball, guided this time past the diving Duminy at point for four more
shortish on middle, turned away through square leg for a single
pitched up outsid eoff, pushed past extra cover but du Plessis hurls himself to his right to prevent the single
pitched up outside off, eased through the in-field on the off side for a single
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and plays it to the bowler
shortish on leg stump, Yuvraj gets across and turns it towards backward square leg for a single
gave it a bit of air, turning away a hint, cut straight to short third man
slightly short on middle, gets back and drops it into the leg side for an easy single
quicker delivery outside off, Yuvraj pads it away
fullish on middle, gets forward and pushes it past midwicket for a single
tossed up, Raina comes down the track to drive it back to the bowler
slightly short outside off, flat, tried to cut it square, missed
teasing him with a flighted delivery outside off, holds its line this time, Yuvraj lets it go

Taufel raises his finger, slightly quicker through the air, angling it on middle and leg, Yuvraj got across and closed the face on it only to miss it, didn't really appear to straighten, was rapped on the pads and the umpire had no doubt, we'll have to check out the replay. The only thing to see is whether it would have gone down but it seemed adjacent to the naked eye
plays the paddle straightaway, fetches it from outside off to play to fine leg
eased through the off side for a single
round the wicket to the right hander, flat and quick on the off stump, defended towards cover
turn there for Botha, shot away from a good length, Raina wisely opted to leave it
straighter one, defended to off
sliding down leg, helped towards short fine, AB chases after it and would have had a run-out if his throw was on-target
quicker on middle and leg, helped along to short fine
flighted delivery outside off, defended back to the bowler
flatter this time, pushed to cover point
length ball outside off, steered to backward point
shorter this time, and on middle and off, defended by Yusuf
didn't take too long for the bouncer to come out, Yusuf ducks under that one
short and well outside off, thanks says Yusuf as he cracks it past backward point for four, Steyn is livid
this time the ball stays low after bouncing short of length outside off, Yusuf looks to cut but is beaten by the lack of bounce
shortish on off, defended off the back foot towards cover, Yusuf sets off for a single but is sent back by Raina
full delivery, blocked to the leg side
works this one to cover for a single
flighted delivery, nudged to the leg side
careful forward defence from Yusuf
Yusuf survives, he goes hard a a length ball outside off, takes the edge which flies between the keeper and first slip, probably the keeper's catch that, Yusuf gets a boundary
and he picks up another free boundary, swats an outside-off ball to deep backward square leg, where Tsotsobe makes a hash of trying to field it, gives away three extra runs
driven down to long-off for a single
one more streaky boundary for Yusuf, swept powerfully by him and in the air, the ball spins past Morkel at deep square leg, the crowd gives the fielder a hard time after that misfield
full delivery, swept to Morkel, who fields it this time and gets a cheer from the crowd
defended to the off side by Raina
he keeps the strike by pushing the ball towards extra cover
pushed to short cover by Raina
clipped to backward square leg for a single
nothing streaky about this boundary, a Yusuf special, he's one of the hardest hitters around, he clouts this one high and just clears the rope at long-on
and another mighty hit from Yusuf, back to back sixes for him, this one is again very high  but longer than the previous one, into the crowd behind long-on
no hat-trick of sixes for Yusuf as he blocks this one

massive! Yusuf wants this to end in a hurry, once more he swings his arms, makes perfect contact and this is the biggest six of the lot, out of the ground, he collected that one from well outside off, 19-run over tilts the match balance
back of a length and just outside off, Raina jumps onto the back foot and jabs the ball behind point
Raina again stuck on the crease and looking to guide the ball past cover, but edges the ball back towards the bowler
Steyn slips in the bouncer, his weakness against the short ball is no secret, and he deals with this one awkwardly, doesn't bother with keeping his eyes on the ball as he ducks under
another short ball, this time Raina swipes it to deep midwicket for a single
Steyn, unsurprisingly, digs in the short ball to Yusuf, just outside off and left alone, it was the slower bouncer
back of a length ball heading for legstump, Yusuf defends off the back foot
length ball on middle and off, played off the back foot towards midwicket by Raina
short of length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-off and a sharp single is pinched
Tsotsobe bowls from wide of the crease, angling into the batsman, defended to the leg side
slants this one down leg, off the pad towards AB, if Yusuf had got a tickle on that that would have been a boundary
length ball outside off, blocked towards the off side
shortish ball outside off, tucked towards point by Yusuf
shortish ball, Raina makes room and carves that one over point for four
short of length ball just outside off, guided towards backward point by Raina
a late call for wide after Steyn fires it short and down the leg side, was well over Raina's head
tries the short ball but this one only rises just above the hip, clipped to fine leg
short of length and outside off, Yusuf looks to chop that past point but is beaten
gets the leading edge as he looks to work the ball towards midwicket, lands safely near cover
pitched up by Steyn, kept low, Yusuf has to adjust late to defend it
short of length ball outside off, Raina opens the face to steer the ball towards short third
overpitched outside off, Yusuf muscles it towards sweeper cover
slanting into the pads, guided down to fine leg by Raina
the Tsotsobe bouncer, Yusuf goes for the hook, the ball sails over the bat and hits Yusuf on the shoulder, pops up towards keeper
overpitched by Tsotsobe, that's Yusuf Pathan's area, another swing of the arms and the ball has disappeared over mid-off for four, third fifty took only 43 balls
Tsotsobe looks for the quicker one, slides it down the leg side
back of length ball outside off, Yusuf looks to scythe that through the off side but the ball stays low and he misses
on the pads, tucked towards square leg for a single

induces the outside edge, it was a full ball just outside off, Yusuf, strangely, stays on the back foot and looks to carve that one, gets the top edge past the keeper, Morne dives at third man to save a run
guided to mid-on for a single
slow in the air, pitching on middle, the back lift suggested that Yusuf was looking to hammer it over  long-on, it was too for the shot and the ball squirts towards the leg side
whipped down to long-on for a single, nit much turn on offer for du Plessis so far
a half-tracker to end the over, Yusuf was eyeing the long-on boundary again, he mistimes an almighty swing, the ball lands safely near mid-on
bowled from wide of the crease, the angle cramps up Yusuf, and the shortish ball is awkwardly defended off the gloves to the leg side
all very adventurous from Raina, short of length ball outside off, Raina backed away a long way and was so far beyond leg that he couldn't reach the outside off ball
Raina living dangerously, he was looking to play a full ball towards midwicket, gets the outside edge and it flies past a diving AB to get a boundary to third man
shortish ball outside off, Raina sways out of the way
'Yes, yes, yes, yes' Raina screams after pushing a back of length ball towards point
back of length ball angling into off, defended towards the bowler
tucked towards mid-on for a single
shortish ball just outside off, cuts the ball towards third man to pick up a single
full and angling into the pads, punched towards mid-on but straight at the fielder so there's no single

Raina won't like to see that replay, a nothing shot, leaves his stumps as he backs away and looks to crash a short of length ball through cover, the trademark extra bounce from Morkel means that attempted flat-bat hit takes the top-edge and flies to AB, Morne does the trick
Morkel's first ball is a length ball just outside off, defended by Harbhajan
fullish ball outside off, defended towards extra cover by Harbhajan

Morne Morkel's great day continues as he makes another superb diving stop at third man, it was an outside edge from Yusuf to a length ball outside edge, Yusuf's had some luck today but he's got a half-century
blocked off the front foot towards the off side
bit of width, Yusuf powers it off the back foot past point

what a shot from Yusuf, Parnell fired that in from wide of the crease, not much room for Yusuf to free his arms, he slices that one behind deep point and wide of third man as well, great timing on that
on offstump, Yusuf walks across and guides the ball to short fine
on the thigh pad, ball rolls in front of square leg for a single
Harbhajan loses his head for a moment, defends off the back foot towards short cover and starts off for a single before sending Yusuf back, no worries for the batsmen in the end
nicely played off the back foot, bu a diving du Plessis stops the ball at cover
lovely delivery from Morne, short of length ball just jags away a touch, Harbhajan can't get his bat anywhere near that one

dropped by Duminy, it was a very tough chance, Harbhajan pushed at a wide delivery without any footwoork, takes the outside edge and flies towards Duminy at backward point, Duminy jumps and has one arm outstretched, tries to grab the ball but can't hang on to it

a short ball from Morkel strikes Yusuf on the glove before cannoning into his bicep, Yusuf was initially looking to duck under the bouncer but was unsure of how high that ball was going to rise, that would have hurt Yusuf
another short ball to round off the over, defended by Yusuf
overpitched on legstump, whipped towards midwicket for a single, and more importantly, its Yusuf on strike now
length ball outside off, cracked to long-off for a single, Yusuf has not trouble playing the pitched-up deliveries
Harbhajan checks his shot to send the ball towards wide mid-on to pick up a single
back of length just outside off, defended off the back foot towards point

Morkel has shown he's an outstanding outfielder, he has pulled off an outstanding catch at third man to send back danger man Yusuf Pathan, it was shortish and wide from Steyn, Yusuf swung his bat at that and gets a top edge, the ball soars towards Morkel at third man, who had to back pedal and took that overhead, it needed a tall man to take that catch, and South Africa had their tallest fielder to pouch it, wild celebrations from the home side
Zaheer gets a warm welcome, a back of length ball moving away, plays inside the line off the back foot
lovely shot from Harbhajan, outside off and he caresses it towards deep backward point
this one keeps low, short of length and only rises as high as Zaheer's knee, he leaves it to the keeper, who can't collect cleanly as it bounces a second time before reaching him

dropped by Botha, his hand goes under the ball at second slip, and what's more that's four runs to India, a short ball form Morkel, jags into the batsman, who can only edge it towards the slips, Botha goes for the ball with one handbut misjudges it
Zaheer is beaten as he looks to slash one over the off side
Zaheer moves away behind leg and defends the back of length ball towards cover
Zaheer again backs away and guides the ball to third man for a single
length ball outside off, defended to the off side by Zaheer
Zaheer gets his front leg out of the way and initially thinks of a big heave, then hangs his bat at an outside off ball, beaten
shortish ball on middle and off, defended off the back foot by Zaheer
Steyn keeps it tight around off, back of a length, Zaheer moves away beyond leg and defends the ball towards point
similar length and on leg stump this time, Zaheer plays it awkwardly towards midwicket and takes the single
safely negotiated, short of length ball on off, pushed towards cover and he screams 'No' to let Zaheer know he doesn't want a single
starts with a short ball well outside off, Zaheer looks to smash that over point, but doesn't make contact
Zaheer keeps gets his front leg out of the way to position himself for a big slog, this time Parnell pitches it on a length and just outside off, Zaheer can't get bat on it
fuller from Parnell, inside-edged past the stumps and to the left of the keeper, AB chases and by the time he collects, batsmen have taken a single
short of length ball well outside off, Harbhajan wants to send that over long-on but again the batsman can't put bat on ball
full and wide, Harbhajan squeezed it past point for a couple
and once more Harbhajan looks to send the ball hurtling beyond long-on, but can't connect, good over from Parnell, who has had a miserable day so far
Zaheer again looking to back away, Tsotsobe follows him, cramping him up, Zaheer defends to the leg side
shortish ball, Zaheer looks to swipe it to midwicket but can't connect, off his body wide of the keeper, Zaheer sets off for a single before being sent back
short of length ball on offstump, slower one, 120kmh, Zaheer plays it with soft hands towards backward point and scampers a single

Harbhajan does the opposite of Zaheer, instead of backing away, he walks across the stumps, he also can't get bat on ball, struck above his waist as he attempts a big heave, he has dive full-length to complete a leg bye
ooh, Zaheer survives, he pokes at another back of length ball, gets the outside edge off the slower ball, it lands short of the keeper
full ball outside leg, Harbhajan had moved way beyond leg, he tried to jab it towards off, he can't, AB collects
swing and a miss from Zaheer, well outside off, no footwork from the batsman, no connection with the ball either
this time it is full and well outside off, Zaheer slices it in the air towards third man, bounces once before reaching the fielder
well, the Indian batsmen have decided the big hits are what they want, no dabs and clips for them, a length ball outside off and Harbhajan throws his bat at it but doesn't connect
whoah, this time he connects, and what a shot that is, off the middle of the bat and that one is dismissed over extra cover for six, he absolutely smoked that length delivery

Harbhajan continues with his all-or-nothing approach, top-edges as he swings another ball outside off, top-edged towards third man where Ingram makes good ground to reach the ball but can't take a low catch
loud appeal for lbw from Parnell, hard to get a decision when you are bowling round the stumps
Harbhajan gets on one knee and flat bats the ball down the ground, he immediately calls for two, but there have to settle for one

Tsotsobe escapes with a ball sliding onto the pads, fine leg and square leg are in the circle, Zaheer can't get bat on it though, AB moves quickly across to collect the ball, he had the gloves off in a jiffy and was set to throw down the stumps as well
slower ball outside off, 111kmh, Zaheer was looking to back away and he is foxed by that one
Zaheer was looking for the Hollywood hit to midwicket, instead he gets a thick inside-edge off a full ball, the Chinese cut races past short fine leg and that's four priceless runs for India

and that's all the swinging Zaheer will do today, another short ball from Tsotsobe, Zaheer was completely cramped for room, he tried to flat-bat that one over the in-field, can't time the ball though and the ball loops to mid-off, this match is on a knife-edge, Nehar and Munaf can't bat but all they need is some trademark Harbhajan hits
a muted lbw appeal, but Nehra signals that he inside-edged that one from Tsotsobe

length ball outside off, Harbhajan waltzes across the stumps and looks to hammer that over midwicket, he's not looking to play out this over, all-out aggression from Harbhajan, can't connect on this occasion

huge! Harbhajan gets the front leg out of the way and blasts that short of length delivery high and into the crowd beyond long-off, is that the game-sealing hit? there was no long-off, only a mid-off in place so it was quite a safe option, Rohit Sharma pumps his fist in the Indian dressing-room, South Africa have a mini-conference
bottom hand comes off as he tries another big heave, ball rolls toward midwicket
he stretches across and tries to poke a delivery outside off, luckily for him there's no edge
length ball outside off, Nehra punches it off the front foot towards cover where Amla fields

short ball on legstump, Nehra tries to take evasive action, he can't evade the ball, off the ribs and past the keeper for a leg bye, Harbhajan wanted Nehra to come back for the second and is not happy that only one run was taken
'Two, two' Nehra calls after tucking a full ball on middle and leg towards square leg, Harbhajan will have none of that, takes the single to get on strike
fullish ball outside off, another edge, this time to third man for a single
superb keeping from AB, that would have been game over if he missed that, it was fired in by Parnell, just beats the bat and scoots low towards AB who collects it to his left
length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side Parnell sprints across to field it, there are loud shouts of 'No, no' from the batsmen
length ball outside off, Nehra confidently takes a big stride forward and defends towards cover
full ball outside off, struck on the pad outside off, there's a stifled shout for lbw, Nehra is quick to show the umpire the bat
a fullish ball is hammered to long-on for a single, two to win now, batsmen have a mid-pitch conference

India have won, Nehra plays a stylish lofted on-drive to clear the in-field and get the boundary that confirms the victory, India go up 2-1 in the series, another nail-biting finish and India managed to get over the finish line despite a series of ill-judged strokes
